message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for you, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset. My asking price is $1000000.  What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but I'm still firm on my valuation. I'm willing to come down a bit to $950000. This leaves room for both of us to make a good deal. Let's try to work something out here.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit higher than $950000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $925000. I believe this is a fair price for both of us.
